metadata.title: CVE-2017-6932 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Drupal core 7.x versions before 7.57 has an external link injectionvulnerability when the language switcher block is used. A similarvulnerability exists in various custom and contributed modules. Thisvulnerability could allow an attacker to trick users into unwillinglynavigating to an external site.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
